member.name: TextureBrush.GetImage
member.summary: The TextureBrush.GetImage method gets a pointer to the Image object that is defined by this texture brush.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the Image object that is defined by this texture brush.

member.name: TextureBrush.GetTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.GetTransform method gets the transformation matrix of this texture brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Matrix object that receives the transformation matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.GetWrapMode
member.summary: The TextureBrush.GetWrapMode method gets the wrap mode currently set for this texture brush.
member.returns: This method returns the wrap mode currently set for this texture brush. The value returned is one of the elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.MultiplyTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.MultiplyTransform method updates this brush's transformation matrix with the product of itself and another matrix.
member.param: Pointer to the matrix to be multiplied by this brush's current transformation matrix.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of multiplication. specifies that the passed matrix is on the left, and specifies that the passed matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.ResetTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.ResetTransform method resets the transformation matrix of this texture brush to the identity matrix. This means that no transformation takes place.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.RotateTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.RotateTransform method updates this texture brush's current transformation matrix with the product of itself and a rotation matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the angle, in degrees, of rotation.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the rotation matrix is on the left, and specifies that the rotation matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.ScaleTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.ScaleTransform method updates this texture brush's current transformation matrix with the product of itself and a scaling matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the amount to scale in the x direction.
Real number that specifies the amount to scale in the y direction.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the scaling matrix is on the left, and specifies that the scaling matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.SetTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.SetTransform method sets the transformation matrix of this texture brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Matrix object that specifies the transformation matrix to use.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.SetWrapMode
member.summary: The TextureBrush.SetWrapMode method sets the wrap mode of this texture brush.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is painted with this texture brush.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a defining rectangle, and a set of image properties.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.

Reference to a rectangle that defines the size of this texture brush and the portion of the image to be used by this texture brush. If the Image object is created from a metafile, the brush uses the entire image, which is scaled to fit the size of the brush.
Optional. Pointer to an ImageAttributes object that contains properties of the image. The default value is NULL.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a defining rectangle, and a set of image properties.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.

Reference to a rectangle that defines the size of this texture brush and the portion of the image to be used by this texture brush. If the Image object is created from a metafile, the brush uses the entire image, which is scaled to fit the size of the brush.
Optional. Pointer to an ImageAttributes object that contains properties of the image. The default value is NULL.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image and a wrap mode. The size of the brush defaults to the size of the image, so the entire image is used by the brush.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.
Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is painted with this texture brush. The default value is WrapModeTile.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode, and a defining rectangle.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.
Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is painted with this texture brush.

Reference to a rectangle that defines the size of this texture brush and the portion of the image to be used by this texture brush. If the Image object is created from a metafile, the brush uses the entire image, which is scaled to fit the size of the brush.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode, and a defining rectangle.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.
Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is painted with this texture brush.

Reference to a rectangle that defines the size of this texture brush and the portion of the image to be used by this texture brush. If the Image object is created from a metafile, the brush uses the entire image, which is scaled to fit the size of the brush.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode, and a defining set of coordinates.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.
Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is painted with this texture brush.
Leftmost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush.
Uppermost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush.
Width of the brush and width of the image portion to be used by the brush.
Height of the brush and height of the image portion to be used by the brush.

member.name: TextureBrush.TextureBrush
member.summary: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode, and a defining set of coordinates.
member.param: Pointer to an Image object that contains the bitmap of the image to use.
Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is painted with this texture brush.
Leftmost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush.
Uppermost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush.
Width of the brush and width of the image portion to be used by the brush.
Height of the brush and height of the image portion to be used by the brush.

member.name: TextureBrush.TranslateTransform
member.summary: The TextureBrush.TranslateTransform method updates this brush's current transformation matrix with the product of itself and a translation matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the horizontal component of the translation.
Real number that specifies the vertical component of the translation.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the translation matrix is on the left, and specifies that the translation matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
